long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds Inscriptions from Conlan's NFT Scribe contract to OpenSea asset pages.

See Conlan's NFT Scribe contract at https://etherscan.io/address/0xC207efACb12a126D382fA28460BB815F336D845f#code and visit the application at https://conlan.github.io/nft-scribe/.  It's a smart contract that allows you to add a message to a nonfungible token if you own it.

OpenSea is the largest general marketplace for nonfungible tokens, with the broadest set of categories and the most items.  In other words, it's kind of like eBay for CryptoKitties.

This extension allows you to interact with Conlan's NFT Scribe contract right from an OpenSea page.  If a token you don't own has no inscriptions, it does nothing.  If a token you don't own has inscriptions, it will inject them into the token's detail page on OpenSea.  If you own a token and it has no inscriptions, it will inject a form that allows you to add inscriptions.  If you own a token and it has inscriptions, it will inject the inscriptions and a form that allows you to add new inscriptions. 


Update for v0.0.2:  You can now inscribe straight from an OpenSea page.

Please view our privacy policy at http://danieljamesviau.com/scribe-extension-privacy-policy.html.  We don't collect, store, or share your information.
